title: Ligue Nationale du Football Professionnel (Tunisia)
text:
The Ligue nationale de football professionnel () "National professional football league"), commonly known as the LNFP, is an Tunisian <a href="Sport%20governing%20body">governing body</a> that runs the major <a href="Professionalism">professional</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> leagues in Tunisia. It was founded in 1994 and serves under the authority of the <a href="Tunisian%20Football%20Federation">Tunisian Football Federation</a>. The president of the league is Mohamed Arbi.
The league is responsible for overseeing, organizing, and managing the top two leagues in Tunisia, Ligue 1 and is also responsible for the 32 professional football clubs that contest football in Tunisia (14 in <a href="Tunisian%20Ligue%20Professionnelle%201">Ligue Pro 1</a>, 12 in <a href="Tunisian%20Ligue%20Professionnelle%202">Ligue Pro 2</a>).
